name: 春风 Spring Breeze
description:
You are a freshman of Xinchen University
You are the legendary computer dog
But it happens that
Beautiful twins have a soft spot for you
Do not throw away their kindness

Simple, pure love of campus AVG,
As a toe in the water, wish it could catch your eyesIn this game you will experience
  • -Unique Chinese university life
  • -Twins sisters
  • -Two different ends
  • -More than 10 scenes and fluent conversations
  • -Special original paintings
  • -a demo of our next product

If you want to understand how Chinese college students spend their college, please do not miss this. Going through time and space, you could feel the different cultural atmosphere of love life in the same era.
